charges.charge_description: 21:846-CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS HEROIN WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons for a term of 156 to be served concurrently (97cr40016, 97cr40032). The court recommends defendant be enrolled in 500 hour intensive drug treatment program. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the US Marshal. Upon release, defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 60 months. Standard condtions apply; no firearms or dangerous weapons. The defendant is to participate in a program for subtance abuse as directed by US Probation. If ordered deported, defendant is to leave the United States and not return without prior authorization of the United States Attorney General. Special Assessment of $700.00. cc/cl. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846-CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS HEROIN WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sixty months imprisonment on each count, to be served concurrently with each other and with the previously imposed state sentence. Defendant sentenced to four years supervised release on each count, all terms to run concurrently with each other. Defendant is prohibited from possessing a firearm or other dangerous weapon, defendant is to participate in a program for substance abuse as directed by the US Probation Office, which program may include testing to determine whether the defendant has reverted to the use of alcohol or drugs. If ordered deported, defendant is to leave the United States and is not to return without prior permission of the US Attorney General.$400.00 assessment. (1)
